text: aur tum apanee qasamon ko aapas mein ke phasaad ka sabab na banao taaki (logon ke) qadam jamane ke baad (islaam se) ukhad jaen aur phir aakhirakaar qayaamat mein tumhen logon ko khuda kee raah se rokane kee paadaash (rokane ke badale) mein azaab ka maza chakhana pade aur tumhaare vaaste bada sakht azaab ho
